testcase.name: Test Script 2 : To test save functionality of valid inputs/changes
Test Script 3 : To test the modification and save functionality of valid inputs/changes
Test Script 4 : To test the modification and save functionality of empty test data
Test Script 5 : To check if the data can be saved any other way other than the save button
Test Script 6 : To test the modification and cancel functionality
Test Script 7 : Checking if the save and cancel buttons are inactive when no changes are made the employee details.
Test Script 8 : Check for valid length inputs for the Name field.
Test Script 9 : Check for invalid length inputs for the Name field.
Test Script 10 : Check for valid type inputs for the Name field.
Test Script 11 : Check for valid length and datatype inputs for the Phone Number field.
Test Script 12 : Check for short length inputs for the Phone Number field.
Test Script 13 : Check for long length inputs for the Phone Number field.
Test Script 14 : Check for invalid datatype inputs for the Phone Number field.
Test Script 15 : Check for valid length inputs for the Title field.
Test Script 16 : Check for invalid length inputs for the Title field.
Test Script 17 : Check for invalid datatype inputs for the Title field.
Test Script 18 : Error Message persists from one employee to another, once an Phone number field throws an error and turns red, the color persists
Test Script 19 : Error Message persists from one employee to another, once an name/title field throws an error and turns red, any data after that is not saved
